tutorialIntroduction: Oppi is a tool to practice declension and conjugation in Finnish language. Its working is simple, it has two main modes: searching and testing. Swipe or press the arrows to move inside the tutorial or press the × in the top right corner to skip it.
searchExplanation: Type a word in the search field and press the search button (you can also press Ctrl + ⏎ in the keyboard).
searchTableExplanation: It shows the declension or conjugation table of that word.
testExplanation: Like in the searching part, type a word in the search field and then press the test button (you can also press ⏎ in the keyboard).
testTableExplanation: It shows the declension or conjugation testing table for that word. Here, you have to fill the table fields with the correct declension/conjugation forms.
testCheckCorrectData: Now you can check if you filled it correctly or not by pressing the check button. Each field turns green if it is correclty filled and red if it is incorrectly filled. If the word has more than one way to be declined/conjugated, it will check the correctness with the way that has less errors.
testResetForm: You can reset the table by pressing the reset button.
randomExplanation: You can get a random word pressing the random word button. It can be any kind of word, but you can restrict the kind of word in the menu.
onlyRegularAndNotNuoripari: This app can only decline regular Finnish nouns and adjectives with a declension type different from nuoripari declension type.
onlyRegularAndNotKumajaaAndKaikaa: This app can only conjugate Finnish regular verbs with a conjugation type different from kumajaa and kaikaa conjugation types.
enjoyOppi: This is all for now. I'll try to add more features in the future. I hope you find this app useful.
aboutText: Finnish declination and conjugation learning tool. If you have any suggestions or you want to help, please contact me on GitHub.
